Projects.title: My Projects
Projects.description: Here are my favorite projects and commercial projects; unfortunately, not all projects have been released or can be shown.

works.Next Portfolio-courses: My three-month project that I did completely from scratch, and I am very pleased with it. The application includes: authorization, registration, adding/editing/deleting tests, profiles, comments, and much more interesting stuff üëå.
works.React-notes: An application where each user can write their own note. The application includes: authorization, registration, and adding notes.
works.Quotes-app: An application for testing typing speed; currently, only English quotes are supported.
works.React-comix: An application where the interaction between a JSON server and a React app is implemented; overall, I think I did quite well.
works.Internet-shop: My first online store. Here I learned to layout complex designs.
works.Github-finder: My first application in TypeScript. Quite simple yet informative application.
works.VK-loader: An application inspired by the file tab on vk.com. Of course, this is not a social network where files play a significant role, but I think I created a pretty good copy!
works.Trello: Probably, there is no person who hasn‚Äôt made a todo app, so I decided to create something similar using native tools.
